item.title: 连接github时connection reset的问题
item.description: git连接时遇到问题 1ssh -T git@github.com 2Connection reset by 140.82.113.3 port 22 解决方案 在所生成ssh秘钥文件夹下（~/.ssh/）使用文本文档新建 config文件（无后缀）。 修改代

item.title: Typora快捷键
item.description: 本地编辑md我用的是typora，用一些快捷键会更好用 设置标题 ctrl + 1 ~6 标题1~6 等同于 一级标题：#+空格+标题内容 二级标题：##+空格+标题

item.title: 博客搭建：Jekyll+GithubPages

item.title: git push：本地分支和远程分支冲突问题解决
item.description: 1 failed to push some refs 报错 1git push -u origin main 2To https://github.com/xxxx.git 3 ! [rejected] main -> main (non-fast-forward) 4error: failed to push some refs to 'https://github.com/xxxx.git' 5hint: Updates were rejected because the tip of your current branch is behind 6hint: its remote counterpart. Integrate the remote changes (e.g. 7hint: 'git pull ...') before pushing again. 8hint: See the 'Note about fast-forwards' in 'git push --help' for
